// Search function
export const searchMedicines = query => {
  const searchTerm = query.toLowerCase().trim();
  if (!searchTerm) return [];
  return medicines.filter(medicine => medicine.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) || medicine.brand.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) || medicine.category.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) || medicine.uses.some(use => use.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm)) || medicine.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm));
};

// Get medicines by category
export const getMedicinesByCategory = category => {
  return medicines.filter(medicine => medicine.category === category);
};

// Get medicine by ID
export const getMedicineById = id => {
  return medicines.find(medicine => medicine.id === Number.parseInt(id));
};

// Get trending medicines
export const getTrendingMedicines = () => {
  return medicines.filter(medicine => medicine.rating >= 4.0).sort((a, b) => b.rating - a.rating).slice(0, 8);
};

// Categories
export const categories = [{
  id: "fever",
  name: "Fever & Pain",
  icon: "🤒",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "fever").length
}, {
  id: "vitamins",
  name: "Vitamins",
  icon: "💊",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "vitamins").length
}, {
  id: "antibiotics",
  name: "Antibiotics",
  icon: "🦠",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "antibiotics").length
}, {
  id: "cough",
  name: "Cough & Cold",
  icon: "🤧",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "cough").length
}, {
  id: "diabetes",
  name: "Diabetes",
  icon: "🩸",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "diabetes").length
}, {
  id: "skincare",
  name: "Skincare",
  icon: "🧴",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "skincare").length
}, {
  id: "heart",
  name: "Heart & BP",
  icon: "❤️",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "heart").length
}, {
  id: "digestive",
  name: "Digestive",
  icon: "🫃",
  count: medicines.filter(m => m.category === "digestive").length
}];

// Dummy medicine data with 100+ items
export const medicines = [
  // Fever & Pain Relief
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Paracetamol 500mg",
    brand: "Crocin",
    category: "fever",
    price: 25,
    originalPrice: 30,
    rating: 4.5,
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584308666744-24d5c474f2ae?w=150&h=150&fit=crop",
    prescription: false,
    inStock: true,
    description: "Effective pain relief and fever reducer",
    uses: ["Fever", "Headache", "Body pain"],
    dosage: "1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours",

    manufacturer: "GSK",
  },
  {

    name: "Ibuprofen 400mg",
    brand: "Brufen",

    price: 45,
    originalPrice: 55,

  {

  // Vitamins & Supplements
  {
    id: 4,

  {

    uses: ["Heart health", "Brain function", "Joint health"],
    dosage: "1-2 capsules daily",

    manufacturer: "Neuherbs",
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Multivitamin Tablets",
    brand: "Centrum",
    category: "vitamins",
    price: 450,
    originalPrice: 550,

// Search function
export const searchMedicines = (query) => {
  const searchTerm = query.toLowerCase().trim()

  if (!searchTerm) return []

  return medicines.filter(
    (medicine) =>
      medicine.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
      medicine.brand.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
      medicine.category.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
      medicine.uses.some((use) => use.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm)) ||
      medicine.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm),
  )
}

// Get medicines by category
export const getMedicinesByCategory = (category) => {
  return medicines.filter((medicine) => medicine.category === category)
}

// Get medicine by ID
export const getMedicineById = (id) => {
  return medicines.find((medicine) => medicine.id === Number.parseInt(id))
}

// Get trending medicines
export const getTrendingMedicines = () => {
  return medicines
    .filter((medicine) => medicine.rating >= 4.0)
    .sort((a, b) => b.rating - a.rating)
    .slice(0, 8)
}
